bibdata.title: IEEE Guide for Measurements of Electromagnetic Properties of Earth Media
IEEE Guide for Measurements of Electromagnetic Properties of Earth Media

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers

bibdata.abstract: Measurements of the electrical properties of naturally occurring solids are covered in the scope of this project. Not covered are methods that rely on mapping earth structure anomalies unless directly related to electrical properties. Coverage of numerical methods for forward/inverse modeling is limited.

Measurements of the electrical properties of naturally occurring solids are covered in the scope of this project. Not covered are methods that rely on mapping earth structure anomalies unless directly related to electrical properties. Coverage of numerical methods for forward/inverse modeling is limited.

organization.name: Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers
